DOC.brief_summary: This study will compare acid-base changes during hemodialysis treatments with a standard dialysis bath versus a lower bicarbonate dialysis bath, and aims to define the factors that limit equilibration of the bicarbonate concentration in a patient's blood with that in the dialysate.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Standard Versus Low Bicarbonate Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Receiving chronic thriceweekly conventional hemodialysis for at least 3 months Age > 18 years Use of oral alkali within the previous month Hospitalization within the previous month Inability to provide written informed consent Pregnancy
